name: css-advanced-natours-udemy1
description: * => Variables: for reusable values such as colors, font-sizes, spacing, etc; * => Nesting: to nest selectors inside of one another, allowing us to write less code; * => Operators: for mathematical operations right inside of CSS; * => Partials and imports: to write CSS in different files and importing them all into one single file; * => Mixins: to write reusable pieces of CSS code; * => Functions: similar to mixins, with the difference that they produce a value that can than be used;  * => Extends: to make different selectors inherit declarations that are common to all of them; * => Control directives: for writing complex code using conditionals and loops (not covered in this course).
